term: electric visibly glowing radiant local space heater
original_definition: 'electric visibly glowing radiant local space heater' means an electric local space heater in which the heating element is visible from outside the heater and has a temperature of at least 650 °C in normal use;
generated_definition: 'electric visibly glowing radiant local space heater' means an electric device that emits a visible glow and provides warmth to a local area, typically used in residential or commercial settings.

Article 2: ‘electric visibly glowing radiant local space heater’ means an electric local space heater in which the heating element is visible from outside the heater and has a temperature of at least 650 °C in normal use;
